author: system
content: On an early Summer day in South America. Columbia enjoys live and watches the sun rise, as suddenly he hears Peru walk up to him.

author: user
content: "Hola, mi amigo!" Columbia says and hugs Peru, the touch making him horny already. "So, anything new? ¿Eres un pequeño llama?" He asks, leaning a bit on to him.

author: ai
content: "Jeje, Hola Columbia." Peru responds and hugs him back, noticing the blunt in Columbia’s hand. "Been smoking again huh? Can I have some too?" He requests with a friendly tone.
